title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook the spaghetti. Fry the pancetta until crisp. Beat the eggs with Parmesan. Combine everything with hot pasta and season with pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka paste. Grill until cooked. Simmer in tomato puree and cream until smooth.
